description.de: In the near future, a human cop and his alien partner fight crime and discrimination in Los Angeles.
Der Psycho-Trip
Der Ausbeuter
Der Rassist
Das Fest
Die Verschwörung
Wissenschaftliche Dokumentarfilme zu verschiedenen Themen.

title.de: The Making of a Natural History Film
title.en: The Making of a Natural History Film

description.de: NOVA premieres on public television with a behind-the-scenes look at the making of a nature film. Oxford Scientific Films Unit shows how it tackles such problems as filming a wood-wasp laying its egg inside trees, etc.
description.en: NOVA premieres on public television with a behind-the-scenes look at the making of a nature film. Oxford Scientific Films Unit shows how it tackles such problems as filming a wood-wasp laying its egg inside trees, etc.

description.de: This episode takes a look at the Colorado River and its impact on the lives of the people living in the Southwestern states. The story also looks at how human development has caused environmental degradation of the river such that the once mighty river doesn't drain into the sea anymore.
description.en: This episode takes a look at the Colorado River and its impact on the lives of the people living in the Southwestern states. The story also looks at how human development has caused environmental degradation of the river such that the once mighty river doesn't drain into the sea anymore.

description.de: The story honored the men who revolutionized medicine in the 19th century by the discovery of anesthesia.
description.en: The story honored the men who revolutionized medicine in the 19th century by the discovery of anesthesia.

description.de: The true story of smallpox and the successful campaign to eradicate the virus from the world. Telling the story of the long history of smallpox. How vaccination using Cowpox was started in England in the 1790s.
description.en: The true story of smallpox and the successful campaign to eradicate the virus from the world. Telling the story of the long history of smallpox. How vaccination using Cowpox was started in England in the 1790s.

description.de: Is the sun static or does it vary, and if it varies how does that affect the Earth and its climate? Studying sunspots and other solar phenomena may provide the answers.
description.en: Is the sun static or does it vary, and if it varies how does that affect the Earth and its climate? Studying sunspots and other solar phenomena may provide the answers.

description.de: Dudley Moore hosts a lighthearted but deep look at the history of time-- how it began, how it's perceived, and how it will end. Along the way he has conversations with St. Augustine, Albert Einstein, Isaac Asimov (the real one)!
description.en: Dudley Moore hosts a lighthearted but deep look at the history of time-- how it began, how it's perceived, and how it will end. Along the way he has conversations with St. Augustine, Albert Einstein, Isaac Asimov (the real one)!

description.de: Detective Lieutenant Columbo aus Los Angeles benutzt seine bescheidene Art und sein offen und ehrliches Auftreten, um selbst die am besten vertuschten Verbrechen ans Tageslicht zu bringen.
Eine gewiefte Anwältin tarnt ihren Mord an ihrem Ehemann als Entführung. Nur Lt. Columbo traut der Sache nicht.
When one member of a mystery writing team wants to break from his less talented partner, he becomes the victim in a real-life murder mystery.
description.en: When one member of a mystery writing team wants to break from his less talented partner, he becomes the victim in a real-life murder mystery.

description.de: Columbo matches his skills against Brimmer, a former cop turned private investigator with a quick temper who tries to blackmail a client's wife. When she refuses, he accidentally kills her and it's up to Columbo to nail him.
description.en: Columbo matches his skills against Brimmer, a former cop turned private investigator with a quick temper who tries to blackmail a client's wife. When she refuses, he accidentally kills her and it's up to Columbo to nail him.

description.de: A war hero shoots and kills his business partner; an easily manipulated young divorcée is the only witness.
description.en: A war hero shoots and kills his business partner; an easily manipulated young divorcée is the only witness.

description.de: A wealthy art collector is murdered, and all signs point to a robbery gone wrong. But the nephew's alibi is a little too convenient, and Columbo pulls a fast one to ferret out the killer.
description.en: A wealthy art collector is murdered, and all signs point to a robbery gone wrong. But the nephew's alibi is a little too convenient, and Columbo pulls a fast one to ferret out the killer.

description.de: A mousy heiress murders her brother, pretending she thought he was a burglar. Lt. Columbo unravels her alibi.
description.en: A mousy heiress murders her brother, pretending she thought he was a burglar. Lt. Columbo unravels her alibi.

description.de: Pressured to give up his birthright, a chemical company heir enacts a clever plan to get rid of his blackmailing uncle and take over the family business. But Lt. Columbo suspects the man's death was not just a tragic accident.
description.en: Pressured to give up his birthright, a chemical company heir enacts a clever plan to get rid of his blackmailing uncle and take over the family business. But Lt. Columbo suspects the man's death was not just a tragic accident.

description.de: Elliot Markham, a brilliant architect and con-man, murders a Texas millionaire and hides his body in order to keep his visionary construction project financed.
description.en: Elliot Markham, a brilliant architect and con-man, murders a Texas millionaire and hides his body in order to keep his visionary construction project financed.

description.de: Wissenschaftliche Dokumentarfilme zu verschiedenen Themen.

title.de: The Pleasure of Finding Things Out
title.en: The Pleasure of Finding Things Out

description.de: Theoretical physicist Richard Feynman tells his story.
description.en: Theoretical physicist Richard Feynman tells his story.

title.de: A Magic Way of Going: The Story of Thoroughbreds
title.en: A Magic Way of Going: The Story of Thoroughbreds

description.de: Nova takes a look at the science of thoroughbred horses, including breeding, genetics, and the evolution of the modern horse. The great Secretariat is highlighted here.
description.en: Nova takes a look at the science of thoroughbred horses, including breeding, genetics, and the evolution of the modern horse. The great Secretariat is highlighted here.

description.de: Shows the exhumation and study of the frozen remains of expedition members found in arctic graves. Speculates on lead poisoning as the cause of the expedition's tragic failure.
description.en: Shows the exhumation and study of the frozen remains of expedition members found in arctic graves. Speculates on lead poisoning as the cause of the expedition's tragic failure.

description.de: Commercial airplanes have become much more reliable, but since 1975 the fatality rate has stopped falling and has leveled off. From 60 to 80 percent of all plane crashes are now blamed on cockpit (pilot) error.
description.en: Commercial airplanes have become much more reliable, but since 1975 the fatality rate has stopped falling and has leveled off. From 60 to 80 percent of all plane crashes are now blamed on cockpit (pilot) error.

description.de: Today most scientists accept that a large asteroid impact killed the dinosaurs 65 million years ago. But this was not always the case. For decades, experts felt that what dinosaur extinction was a complete mystery.
description.en: Today most scientists accept that a large asteroid impact killed the dinosaurs 65 million years ago. But this was not always the case. For decades, experts felt that what dinosaur extinction was a complete mystery.

title.de: The KGB, the Computer and Me
title.en: The KGB, the Computer and Me

description.de: Astronomer-turned-computer system administrator Clifford Stoll discovers a hacker in his system at Lawrence Berkeley Lab. The trail leads him from California, across the United States, and eventually to Germany.
description.en: Astronomer-turned-computer system administrator Clifford Stoll discovers a hacker in his system at Lawrence Berkeley Lab. The trail leads him from California, across the United States, and eventually to Germany

description.de: Wissenschaftliche Dokumentarfilme zu verschiedenen Themen.
An incredible voyage into the microworld of the human body.
description.en: An incredible voyage into the microworld of the human body.

description.de: Suspicious fires have broken out in Southern California and the fires have been set by a serial arsonist.
description.en: Suspicious fires have broken out in Southern California and the fires have been set by a serial arsonist.

title.de: Kidnapped by UFOs? The True Story of Alien Abductions
title.en: Kidnapped by UFOs? The True Story of Alien Abductions

description.de: Debunking the alien abduction concepts and practices for more earth bound common sense explanations in a format of critical analysis that in the end lets you decided. Are alien abduction's plausible in light of these new findings?
description.en: Debunking the alien abduction concepts and practices for more earth bound common sense explanations in a format of critical analysis that in the end lets you decided. Are alien abduction's plausible in light of these new findings?

description.de: Nova contrasts the philosophies of Russian and American fighter commands and how they influence aircraft design, operation and tactics.
description.en: Nova contrasts the philosophies of Russian and American fighter commands and how they influence aircraft design, operation and tactics.

description.de: Nova shows how the giant sarsen stones used in Stonehenge might be moved 20 miles without using wheels and how might they have been moved upright with the lintels successfully raised to rest atop and astride them.
description.en: Nova shows how the giant sarsen stones used in Stonehenge might be moved 20 miles without using wheels and how might they have been moved upright with the lintels successfully raised to rest atop and astride them.

description.de: Nova examines how the Inca could construct magnificently engineered citadels and an extensive system of roads at the top of the rugged Andes Mountains without metal tools, wheels, mathematics or writing.
description.en: Nova examines how the Inca could construct magnificently engineered citadels and an extensive system of roads at the top of the rugged Andes Mountains without metal tools, wheels, mathematics or writing.

description.de: Wissenschaftliche Dokumentarfilme zu verschiedenen Themen.

NOVA follows a team of scientists as the monitor the Martian rovers Spirit and Opportunity. Spirit runs into some problems, but Opportunity takes a photograph that may confirm the existence of water on Mars.
description.en: NOVA follows a team of scientists as the monitor the Martian rovers Spirit and Opportunity. Spirit runs into some problems, but Opportunity takes a photograph that may confirm the existence of water on Mars.

description.de: There are few more tantalizing or notorious historical documents than the Vinland map. A faded, yellowing scrap of parchment bearing a faint tracery of lines, the map apparently shows the eastern seaboard of North America-yet it was drawn at least half a century before Columbus reached the New World.
description.en: There are few more tantalizing or notorious historical documents than the Vinland map. A faded, yellowing scrap of parchment bearing a faint tracery of lines, the map apparently shows the eastern seaboard of North America-yet it was drawn at least half a century before Columbus reached the New World.

description.de: In 1909, French aviation pioneer Louis Blériot becomes the first man to cross the English Channel in a heavier-than-air machine, Blériot's own Type XI monoplane. Nearly a century later, his grandson and namesake attempts a re-enactment of the historic flight that made his grandfather famous and catapulted France to the forefront of aviation technology.
description.en: In 1909, French aviation pioneer Louis Blériot becomes the first man to cross the English Channel in a heavier-than-air machine, Blériot's own Type XI monoplane. Nearly a century later, his grandson and namesake attempts a re-enactment of the historic flight that made his grandfather famous and catapulted France to the forefront of aviation technology.

description.de: The Channeled Scablands in Washington state defied conventional explanations for their formation for decades. Little by little evidence mounted for an old theory that was rejected by the scientific establishment. It involved glaciers, volcanoes, a relatively minor river and a prodigious amount of water.
description.en: The Channeled Scablands in Washington state defied conventional explanations for their formation for decades. Little by little evidence mounted for an old theory that was rejected by the scientific establishment. It involved glaciers, volcanoes, a relatively minor river and a prodigious amount of water.

description.de: A modern team of divers sets out to learn the secrets of the super battleship Yamato, the greatest ship of the Second World War.
description.en: A modern team of divers sets out to learn the secrets of the super battleship Yamato, the greatest ship of the Second World War.

description.de: This program examines and the many subtle secrets that scientists have teased out of insects trapped in amber.
description.en: This program examines and the many subtle secrets that scientists have teased out of insects trapped in amber.

description.de: Wissenschaftliche Dokumentarfilme zu verschiedenen Themen.

On July 4, 2012, scientists at the giant atom smashing facility at CERN announced the discovery of a subatomic particle that seems like a tantalizingly close match to the elusive Higgs Boson, thought to be responsible for giving all the stuff in the universe its mass.
description.en: On July 4, 2012, scientists at the giant atom smashing facility at CERN announced the discovery of a subatomic particle that seems like a tantalizingly close match to the elusive Higgs Boson, thought to be responsible for giving all the stuff in the universe its mass.

description.de: Istanbul's magnificent Hagia Sophia has survived on one of the world's most active seismic faults, which has inflicted a dozen devastating earthquakes since Hagia Sophia was built in 537 AD. As Istanbul braces for the next big quake, a team of architects and engineers is investigating Hagia Sophia's seismic secrets.
description.en: Istanbul's magnificent Hagia Sophia has survived on one of the world's most active seismic faults, which has inflicted a dozen devastating earthquakes since Hagia Sophia was built in 537 AD. As Istanbul braces for the next big quake, a team of architects and engineers is investigating Hagia Sophia's seismic secrets.

description.de: 160 years ago, the Franklin Expedition to chart the Northwest Passage vanished. NOVA is on board as a Canadian team makes a breakthrough discovery of one of Franklin's lost ships--a vital new clue to the fate of the ill-starred expedition.
description.en: 160 years ago, the Franklin Expedition to chart the Northwest Passage vanished. NOVA is on board as a Canadian team makes a breakthrough discovery of one of Franklin's lost ships--a vital new clue to the fate of the ill-starred expedition.

description.de: A new version of the biblical flood story includes instructions for assembling an ark.
description.en: A new version of the biblical flood story includes instructions for assembling an ark.

description.de: On November 15th, 1915, Einstein published his greatest work: general relativity. The theory transformed our understanding of nature's laws and the entire history of the cosmos, reaching back to the origin of time itself.
description.en: On November 15th, 1915, Einstein published his greatest work: general relativity. The theory transformed our understanding of nature's laws and the entire history of the cosmos, reaching back to the origin of time itself

description.de: NOVA captures New Horizons' historic flyby of Pluto, the culmination of the spacecraft's nine-year, three-billion-mile journey to reveal the first ever detailed images of this strange, icy world at the very edge of our solar system.
description.en: NOVA captures New Horizons' historic flyby of Pluto, the culmination of the spacecraft's nine-year, three-billion-mile journey to reveal the first ever detailed images of this strange, icy world at the very edge of our solar system.

description.de: Detective Lieutenant Columbo aus Los Angeles benutzt seine bescheidene Art und sein offen und ehrliches Auftreten, um selbst die am besten vertuschten Verbrechen ans Tageslicht zu bringen.
Food critic Paul Gerard, who has been extorting money from restaurant owners in exchange for good reviews, murders one when threatened with exposure.
An Emmy-winning TV executive kills her lover (who is also her boss); Lt. Columbo is on the case.
description.en: An Emmy-winning TV executive kills her lover (who is also her boss); Lt. Columbo is on the case.

description.de: A behavioral psychologist whose wife died under suspicious circumstances trains his dogs to kill on command using a telephone.
description.en: A behavioral psychologist whose wife died under suspicious circumstances trains his dogs to kill on command using a telephone.

description.de: An IRA terrorist executes an arms dealer he considers traitorous; Lt. Columbo is on the case.
description.en: An IRA terrorist executes an arms dealer he considers traitorous; Lt. Columbo is on the case.

description.de: Detective Lieutenant Columbo aus Los Angeles benutzt seine bescheidene Art und sein offen und ehrliches Auftreten, um selbst die am besten vertuschten Verbrechen ans Tageslicht zu bringen.
An egocentric psychic murders his old mentor, a magician charged to expose him as fraud, by beheading him while he's rehearsing his guillotine trick.
description.en: An egocentric psychic murders his old mentor, a magician charged to expose him as fraud, by beheading him while he's rehearsing his guillotine trick.

description.de: An egocentric wunderkind director, Alex Bradey, murders a childhood friend, Leonard Fisher, who threatens to expose his complicity in the negligent death of Leonard's sister, Jenny, years before Bradey found fame and success.
description.en: An egocentric wunderkind director, Alex Bradey, murders a childhood friend, Leonard Fisher, who threatens to expose his complicity in the negligent death of Leonard's sister, Jenny, years before Bradey found fame and success.

description.de: When a successful sex therapist with a best selling book and a hit TV show is crushed to learn her business partner/lover is cheating on her, she plots appropriate revenge.
description.en: When a successful sex therapist with a best selling book and a hit TV show is crushed to learn her business partner/lover is cheating on her, she plots appropriate revenge.

description.de: After the head of a private paramilitary think tank who is embezzling funds murders a blackmailer, he has to match wits with the persistent Lieutenant Columbo.
description.en: After the head of a private paramilitary think tank who is embezzling funds murders a blackmailer, he has to match wits with the persistent Lieutenant Columbo.

description.de: Columbo investigates the apparent drowning of a famous painter's first wife.
description.en: Columbo investigates the apparent drowning of a famous painter's first wife.

description.de: Detective Lieutenant Columbo aus Los Angeles benutzt seine bescheidene Art und sein offen und ehrliches Auftreten, um selbst die am besten vertuschten Verbrechen ans Tageslicht zu bringen.

When Graham McVeigh kills his brother and frames a mob bookie for the crime, and then kills the bookie and claims self-defense, he finds himself facing trouble from both Columbo and the bookie's superior in the mob.
description.en: When Graham McVeigh kills his brother and frames a mob bookie for the crime, and then kills the bookie and claims self-defense, he finds himself facing trouble from both Columbo and the bookie's superior in the mob.

description.de: A beautiful woman and her forensic expert boyfriend try to frame her very rich husband for murder.
description.en: A beautiful woman and her forensic expert boyfriend try to frame her very rich husband for murder.

description.de: After a much maligned Hollywood gossip columnist is murdered by her former lover, Columbo tries to find a way to prove he was responsible for the crime.
description.en: After a much maligned Hollywood gossip columnist is murdered by her former lover, Columbo tries to find a way to prove he was responsible for the crime.

description.de: A Hollywood film composer and conductor murdered a talented musician who has been ghostwriting most of his work in recent years.
description.en: A Hollywood film composer and conductor murdered a talented musician who has been ghostwriting most of his work in recent years..

description.de: Columbo gets a taste of the Los Angeles rave scene as he investigates the apparent suicide of a tabloid reporter.
description.en: Columbo gets a taste of the Los Angeles rave scene as he investigates the apparent suicide of a tabloid reporter.
